str2: And, even, also, namely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To burn, scorch. From kauma; to burn.
Large, great, in the widest sense.
Burning heat, heat. From kaio; properly, a burn, but used of a glow.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From blasphemos; to vilify; specially, to speak impiously.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Name, character, fame, reputation. From a presumed derivative of the base of ginosko; a 'name'.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
From exesti; privilege, i.e. force, capacity, competency, freedom, or mastery, delegated influence.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
This; he, she, it.
A blow, stripe, wound; an affliction, plague. From plesso; a stroke; by implication, a wound; figuratively, a calamity.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From meta and noieo; to think differently or afterwards, i.e. Reconsider.
To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
